title: Implement sendPostMessage method in InstagramApiService
description: Create method to send published Instagram posts using MEDIA_SHARE attachment type. Post must be owned by the app user.
dod: Request body with attachment type 'MEDIA_SHARE' and payload.id
Rate limiting and error handling implemented
Returns message ID from API response

notes: Request structure: { recipient: { id }, message: { attachment: { type: 'MEDIA_SHARE', payload: { id: postId } } } }
Post must be owned by the authenticated user
